text: William Robert Dempster Dallas (born 6 March 1931) is a Scottish former professional footballer who played as a defender. He made appearances in the Scottish Football League with St Mirren and in the English Football League with Wrexham ==References== Category:1931 births Category:Living people Category:Scottish footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Luton Town F.C. players Category:St Mirren F.C. players Category:Wrexham A.F.C. players Category:Nuneaton Borough F.C. players Category:Footballers from Glasgow Category:English Football League players
title: William Dallas (footballer)
